description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国传媒人，中国共产党党员。曾任上海报业集团社长、党委书记，现任复旦大学党委书记。
description.en: A media professional from the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He formerly served as the president and party secretary of Shanghai United Media Group and is the current Party Secretary of Fudan University.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: A top research university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国政府与欧洲联盟合作创办的世界顶尖商学院。
description.en: A world-class business school co-founded by the Chinese government and the European Union.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 由解放日报社主办的上海第一份综合性服务类周报。
description.en: The first comprehensive service-oriented weekly newspaper in Shanghai, sponsored by the Jiefang Daily.

description.zh-cn: 上海的一份报纸，后拆分为《新闻晨报》、《新闻午报》、《新闻晚报》。
description.en: A newspaper in Shanghai, later split into 'Shanghai Morning Post', 'Xinwen Wubao', and 'Xinmin Evening News'.

description.zh-cn: 中国上海市的一份大型综合性日报。
description.en: A major comprehensive daily newspaper in Shanghai, China.

nodes.id: 文汇新民联合报业集团

zh-cn: 文汇新民联合报业集团

description.zh-cn: 曾为中国大陆规模最大的报业集团之一，由文汇报社和新民晚报社合并组成。
description.en: Formerly one of the largest press groups in mainland China, formed by the merger of Wen Wei Po and Xinmin Evening News.

description.zh-cn: 上海的一家报业集团，以《解放日报》为旗舰。
description.en: A press group in Shanghai, with Jiefang Daily as its flagship.

nodes.id: 中国共产党上海市委员会宣传部

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会宣传部
en: Propaganda Department of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会主管意识形态方面工作的部门。
description.en: The department of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee in charge of ideological work.

nodes.id: 上海市人民政府新闻办公室

zh-cn: 上海市人民政府新闻办公室

description.zh-cn: 上海市人民政府的新闻发布机构。
description.en: The press release agency of the Shanghai Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家和媒体人，华人文化集团公司董事长兼首席执行官。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur and media executive, chairman and CEO of CMC Inc.

description.zh-cn: 中国上海市的一家广播电视和传媒集团。
description.en: A radio, television, and media group in Shanghai, China.

nodes.id: 上海东方传媒集团有限公司

zh-cn: 上海东方传媒集团有限公司
en: Shanghai Oriental Media Group Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 上海广播电视台的子公司，负责其市场化运营。
description.en: A subsidiary of Shanghai Media Group responsible for its market-oriented operations.

description.zh-cn: 由解放日报报业集团和文汇新民联合报业集团整合重组而成的报业集团。
description.en: A press group formed by the integration and reorganization of Jiefang Daily Press Group and Wenhui-Xinmin United Press Group.

nodes.id: 中国共产党上海市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会
中国共产党上海市第十一届委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任复旦大学党委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Party Secretary of Fudan University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新闻工作者，现任上海报业集团社长。
description.en: A journalist from the People's Republic of China, current president of Shanghai United Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省绍兴市下辖区，裘新的出生地。
description.en: A district under the administration of Shaoxing, Zhejiang province, and the birthplace of Qiu Xin.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 裘新生于浙江省上虞县。
description.en: Qiu Xin was born in Shangyu County, Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 1988年毕业于复旦大学新闻系，2002年取得新闻学硕士学位。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Journalism at Fudan University in 1988 and obtained a Master's degree in Journalism in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 2004年取得中欧国际工商学院EMBA学位。
description.en: Obtained an EMBA degree from China Europe International Business School in 2004.

position.zh-cn: 记者、副总编辑、党委书记、总编辑
position.en: Reporter, Deputy Editor-in-Chief, Party Secretary, Editor-in-Chief

description.zh-cn: 1988年进入《解放日报》社成为记者。2000年兼任副总编辑。2005年任党委书记、总编辑。
description.en: Joined Jiefang Daily as a reporter in 1988. Became concurrent Deputy Editor-in-Chief in 2000. Served as Party Secretary and Editor-in-Chief from 2005.

description.zh-cn: 1997年被任命为《申江服务导报》筹建组负责人，次年5月担任该报首任主编。
description.en: Appointed as the head of the preparatory team for 'Shenjiang Service Herald' in 1997, and became its first Editor-in-Chief in May of the following year.

position.zh-cn: 副总编辑、常务副总编辑、总编辑
position.en: Deputy Editor-in-Chief, Executive Deputy Editor-in-Chief, Editor-in-Chief

relationships.target: 文汇新民联合报业集团
中国共产党上海市委员会宣传部
上海市人民政府新闻办公室
上海东方传媒集团有限公司
中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 任中国共产党上海市第十一届委员会委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the 11th Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

position.zh-cn: 党委常务副书记、党委书记
position.en: Executive Deputy Party Secretary, Party Secretary

description.zh-cn: 2021年11月任复旦大学党委常务副书记，2023年2月升任党委书记。
description.en: Appointed as the Executive Deputy Party Secretary of Fudan University in November 2021, and promoted to Party Secretary in February 2023.

description.zh-cn: 接替黎瑞刚出任上海广播电视台台长。
description.en: Succeeded Li Ruigang as the president of Shanghai Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 裘新在上海广播电视台任职期间，其大致规划仍在其前任黎瑞刚的安排下进行。
description.en: During Qiu Xin's tenure at Shanghai Media Group, the general planning was still carried out under the arrangements of his predecessor, Li Ruigang.

description.zh-cn: 裘新的上海报业集团社长职务由李芸接任。
description.en: Qiu Xin's position as president of Shanghai United Media Group was taken over by Li Yun.

description.zh-cn: 接替焦扬出任复旦大学党委书记。
description.en: Succeeded Jiao Yang as the Party Secretary of Fudan University.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 裘新享受中华人民共和国国务院授予的政府专家特殊津贴。
description.en: Qiu Xin enjoys a special government expert allowance granted by the State Council of the People's Republic of China.
